mapper.select:
SELECT total, ca.cat_id FROM cs_info_category ca LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) total, cat_id,publish_source FROM cs_info where 1=1
and released_dtime LIKE #{date}
and (publish_source = #{publish_source} or publish_source is null)
GROUP BY cat_id,publish_source ) info ON ca.cat_id = info.cat_id WHERE ca.site_id like 'CMS%' order by ca.cat_id asc

select info_id,title,subtitle,top_title,author,editor,source,hits,input_dtime,thumb_url,content_url,released_dtime from cs_info where rownum <= 10 and site_id like 'CMS%' and released_dtime >= #{start_day} and released_dtime <= #{end_day} order by hits desc

select info_id,title,subtitle,top_title,author,editor,source,hits,input_dtime,thumb_url,content_url,released_dtime from cs_info where info_status = 8 and final_status = 0 and site_id like 'CMS%' and cat_id = #{cat_id} and publish_source like #{publish_source} order by released_dtime desc

select info.info_id,title,subtitle,top_title,author,editor,source,hits,input_dtime,thumb_url,content_url,released_dtime,art.info_content from cs_info info left join cs_info_article art on info.info_id = art.info_id where info.info_id = #{info_id}
